Interface PlayersManager

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface PlayersManager
handle the players of a specific game

      Parameters:

      gameManager - the instance of the gameManager of the server

    • broadCast

      void broadCast(Message message, Socket sender)

      sender - the sender of the message
